TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit TableItemPattern/TableItemPatternInformation extends System.ValueType

Docs.summary: Provides access to the property values of a object using its or accessors.
Gets the ordinal number of the column containing the table cell or item.
Docs.value: A zero-based ordinal number representing the column containing the table cell or item.

remarks.format:
## Examples In the following example, an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.AutomationFocusChangedEvent> listener is declared to track the traversal of table items within a table container. Item properties are recorded upon each focus changed event.
[!code-csharp[UIATableItemPattern_snip#102](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATableItemPattern_snip/CSharp/UIATableItemPattern_snippets.cs#102)] [!code-vb[UIATableItemPattern_snip#102](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATableItemPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIATableItemPattern_snippets.vb#102)] [!code-csharp[UIATableItemPattern_snip#103](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATableItemPattern_snip/CSharp/UIATableItemPattern_snippets.cs#103)] [!code-vb[UIATableItemPattern_snip#103](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATableItemPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIATableItemPattern_snippets.vb#103)]

Docs.summary: Gets the number of columns spanned by a table cell or item.
Docs.value: The number of columns spanned. The default value is 1.

remarks.format:
## Examples In the following example, an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.AutomationFocusChangedEvent> listener is declared to track the traversal of table items within a table container. Item properties are recorded upon each focus changed event.

Docs.summary: Gets a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element that supports the GridPattern control pattern and represents the table cell or item container.
Docs.value: A [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element that supports the GridPattern control pattern and represents the table cell or item container.

remarks.format:

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement[] GetColumnHeaderItems() cil managed

Docs.summary: Retrieves all the column headers associated with a table item or cell.
Docs.returns: A collection of column header elements. The default is an empty array.

remarks.format:
